product_name: Aquaglide Chinook XP One Inflatable Kayak
long_description: The Chinook XP One comfortably fits a solo paddler with space leftover for fishing gear, and its stable, efficient hull offers solid performance when covering distance on water.
short_description: The Chinook XP One comfortably fits a solo paddler with space leftover for fishing gear, and its stable, efficient hull offers solid performance when covering distance on water.
